de.tub.data.dao
Class AbstractDAOFactory

java.lang.Object
  de.tub.data.dao.AbstractDAOFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
DAOFactory
public abstract class AbstractDAOFactory
extends Object

This class is an abstract implementation of a DAO Factory. It is part of the Data Access Object and Abstract Factory design pattern.

Author:
Sebastian Oelke

Constructor Summary
AbstractDAOFactory()

 IDao addDAO(Class<?> clas, IDao dao)
          Adds a concrete DAO to the available DAOs.

Constructor Detail

AbstractDAOFactory

public AbstractDAOFactory()
Method Detail

addDAO

public IDao addDAO(Class<?> clas,
                   IDao dao)
Adds a concrete DAO to the available DAOs.

Parameters:
clas - The key for this DAO.
dao - The DAO.
Returns:
the previous DAO associated with the specified key or null if there was no mapping for this key or the associated value was null before.

getDAO

public IDao getDAO(Class<?> clas)
Finds a specific DAO which is associated with the given key.

Parameters:
clas - The key for the DAO to get.
Returns:
the DAO which is associated with the given key or null if there is no mapping for this key or the associated value is null.

removeDAO

public IDao removeDAO(Class<?> clas)
Removes the DAO associated with the given key.

Parameters:
clas - The key associated with the DAO which is to be removed.
Returns:
the DAO which was associated with the given key or null if there was no mapping for this key or the associated value was null before.

getAvailableDAOs

public Set<Class<?>> getAvailableDAOs()
Gives an overview of available DAOs held by the DAO registration of this DAO Factory.

Returns:
all available DAOs as a Set.
